input.code: ### Some headline Yo wassup * Yo * What Hello

val pipeline = Tokenizer.default andThen Segmenter.default
val text = "This is the first sentence. This is the second one, which is a bit longer."
val doc = pipeline apply Document.fromString(text)
Renderer.renderWeightedAlignment(doc.sentences(0),doc.sentences(1),Seq((1,4,1.0), (3,1,0.1)))
